wiki.groups: [[X-Men]] trainee; formerly [[Xavier Institute For Higher Learning|Xavier Institute]] Student Body
wiki.bio_text: Collection of intelligence on the blind girl called Blindfold, one of the Xavier Institute's more recent students, is still in process. Blindfold seems to be [[Glossary:T#telepathic|telepathic]] in nature and recently showing signs of being able to know future events as well, but the full extent of her powers is unknown as of yet. While she seems unable to control her [[Glossary:G#genetic|genetic]] [[Glossary:M#mutation|mutation]] and often finds herself overwhelmed by the things she reads or feels with her mind, Blindfold has at least once been observed to be able to sense things which remained undetected by other powerful telepaths. Blindfold may be an enormously powerful telepath still lacking the control to use her mental powers efficiently, or she may be a confused teenager with a minor genetic mutation.
